thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 16 of 282
thread.title: Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: I had tried another service that provides food that is already prepared and was very disappointed with the quality. I was hesitant to try Hello Fresh but because of the introductory offer, there was very little risk. I have been extremely pleased with the freshness and quality of the food that is provided. I love the variety of recipes...things I would never have thought to make on my own. I haven't "loved" every meal only because of my own flavor preferences but I have never regretted trying any of them. Some recipes that I had pretty low expectations for surprised me and I ended up loving them. I would highly recommend this service to any of my friends and family who want to eat better, eat out less, and don't like having to go to the store for individual meal ingredients.
